title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 7.0 - Introductory
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 7.0 - Introductory

State Regulations

The following Part 7 is promulgated to establish procedures to effectuate the purposes of section
1204
of the Insurance Law, prohibiting the sale or offer for sale of securities of certain unauthorized insurers to the public in this State, and regulating advertising used in connection with certain offerings of insurance securities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง
7.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
